title: 2019 NYC DOHMH animal control contract award to NYC ACC (Department of Health and Mental Hygiene)

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the New York Freedom of Information Law, I hereby request the following records:

Copies of any and all files and records,  including without limitation all email correspondence sent to or from any email address within the @cityhall.nyc.gov and @health.nyc.gov domains, referencing or pertaining to the contract ("Negotiated Acquisition") awarded by NYC and NYC DOHMH to Animal Care and Control of New York City, Inc. d/b/a Animal Care Centers of NYC in 2018/2019, as referenced in the City Record entry linked below.

https://a856-cityrecord.nyc.gov/RequestDetail/20180510008?fbclid=IwZXh0bgNhZW0CMTAAAR1-Zg5EHT76b8K0ub20AkyKcgpXoqqweMVhsUGFp6XD_O6GDNqWn09t9Cg_aem_6xxj2qdsQezmNZwdr8lzMg

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 5 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Brad Aaron
